20101213074631.000|20101213074636.000|CCO|SENATE FOR THE LAST EIGHT YEARS.

20101213074645.000|20101213074647.000|CCO|WHAT OUR WORK OUGHT TO BE DOING

20101213074651.000|20101213074653.500|CCO|HOW DO WE CLOSE THE BUDGET GAP

20101213074658.500|20101213074701.000|CCO|BACK TO WORK WE WILL NEVER GET
